name: In my head (Soliu)
description:
This game was made in 3 hours 22min for the trijam #210.

Controls

_________________

Movement - left and right arrow keys

Jump-up arrow 

Objective

__________________

It's morning time and it's time to head to school, try to get to the school bus on time while avoiding distractions and the thoughts in your head.

Type out the KeyWords  on the screen in the input box to stop your imagination

Credits

_____________

made all the art myself during the 3-hour period except the bus and player which I got online.

All scripts were written by me

Music by Yrii Semchyshyn from Pixabay
